sentences.en: A new submarine cable was laid between England and Holland.
sentences.cn: 英国至荷兰铺设了新的海底电缆.

sentences.en: A new submarine cable was laid from England to Holland.
sentences.cn: 英国至荷兰间铺设了新的海底电缆。

sentences.en: But on this occasion the fortune he previously enjoyed in World Cup finals with Holland, Australia and South Korea eluded him.
sentences.cn: 但是这个时候运气离开了他尽管他之前享受着带领荷兰，澳大利亚，韩国打进世界杯决赛圈。

sentences.en: Common interests allied Holland with the Protestant German states.
sentences.cn: 共同的利益使荷兰和新教的德国各邦联合了起来.

sentences.en: Have you ever been to Holland?
He goes on to Holland tomorrow.
He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: Holland and the Republic of Ireland drew one-one.
sentences.cn: 荷兰队和爱尔兰队打成了一比一平。

sentences.en: Holland is one of Germany's neighbours.
sentences.cn: 荷兰是德国的邻国之一.

sentences.en: I think my mother’s grandfather came from Holland or something.
sentences.cn: 我想我母亲的祖父来自荷兰或者什么地方。

sentences.en: I vote that we all go to Holland immediately.
sentences.cn: 我建议我们全都立刻前往荷兰。

sentences.en: I was driving along Holland Park Avenue when I was flagged down by three women.
sentences.cn: 我正沿着荷兰公园大道行驶时,有三个妇女招呼我停车.

sentences.en: John went home after three years in Holland.
sentences.cn: 约翰在荷兰呆了三年回国了.

sentences.en: Norway had held Holland to a scoreless draw in Rotterdam.
sentences.cn: 挪威队在鹿特丹以零比零逼平荷兰队。

sentences.en: Our trade agreement with Holland will expire at the end of this year.
sentences.cn: 我国同荷兰的贸易协定今年年底期满.

sentences.en: The car walloped the pavement , charging towards the Holland Tunnel.
sentences.cn: 汽车猛冲过马路,直奔荷兰地道.

sentences.en: There are many dairies in Holland.

trans.tran_cn: 荷兰，(h-)（做童装或窗帘等的）荷兰麻布
